abstract: The bank is shifting its focus to credit cards in the United States while still struggling with the hefty losses in its troubled mortgage division.
snippet: The bank is shifting its focus to credit cards in the United States while still struggling with the hefty losses in its troubled mortgage division.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America took steps on Monday to exit the international credit card business, agreeing to sell off its $8.6 billion Canadian card venture to the TD Bank Group for an undisclosed amount and putting its remaining European card portfolio on the block.

headline.main: Bank of America Sells Canadian Credit Card Business

abstract: The American International Group named Brian T. Schreiber, its executive vice president for Treasury and capital markets, to the additional role of the insurer’s treasurer.
snippet: The American International Group named Brian T. Schreiber, its executive vice president for Treasury and capital markets, to the additional role of the insurer’s treasurer.
lead_paragraph: The American International Group announced Monday that Brian T. Schreiber, its executive vice president for Treasury and capital markets, had been named to the additional role of the insurer’s treasurer.
